document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#18ff86">"Red </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7864ff">Sea," </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">indeed! </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff2878">Talk </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">me </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48ff56">purple </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff448c">Pharaoh </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">have </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48ff56">Navy </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">in </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48ff56">West </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Would </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b454ff">pierce </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">his </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7864ff">Columns </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">thro' </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9870ff">Guileless, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">yet </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">such </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff2878">Glory </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b454ff">fine </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">That </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">all </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">along </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0e05c">Line </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">or </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">not, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff2878">marine </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">or </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">not, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c478ff">divine </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48ff56">Eye </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48ff56">inquires </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">with </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffb218">sigh </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">That </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b454ff">Earth </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">sh'd </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">be </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">so </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff2878">big </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">What </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c478ff">Exultation </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">in </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7864ff">Woe </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">What </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff448c">Wine </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">in </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffb218">fatigue! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: "Red Sea" indeed! Talk not to me
